  • Mon Nov 01 02:50:06 2004, pabs <pabs@pablotron.org>

  • Sat Nov 27 12:58:28 2004, pabs <pabs@pablotron.org>
    • rubilicious.rb: change URI encoding to CGI::escape (suggested by James Britt)
    • rubilicious.rb: added Rubilicious#base_uri, to override the base URI of API requests (the Delicious API documentation says that the URL could change at some point, so this will allow existing rubilicious installs to work without code muckery. You can also set the RUBILICIOUS_BASE_URI environment variable (if it‘s not set, then Rubilicious#base_uri defaults to ‘del.icio.us/api‘
  • Sat Nov 27 13:03:57 2004, pabs <pabs@pablotron.org>

  • Thu Aug 31 17:06:06 EDT 2006, Paul Duncan <pabs@pablotron.org>
    • rubilicious.rb: removed Time, String, and Array additions. I‘ve added the last two back as Rubilicious::StringExtras and Rubilicious::ArrayExtras respectively, but I need to do a bit of tweaking to ensure backwards compatability.
    • rubilicious.rb: switched from String#uri_escape and String#xml_escape to Rubilicios#u and Rubilicious#h, respectively
    • rubilicious.rb: use built-in Time.iso8601 calls
  • Fri Sep 1 00:23:06 EDT 2006, Paul Duncan <pabs@pablotron.org>
    • rubilicious.rb: slightly cleaner private/public
    • rubilicious.rb: add replace and is_private support to Rubilicious#add
    • rubilicious.rb: fix Rubilicious#h so it actually does something
    • rubilicious.rb: convert timestamps to GMT first (the delicious API only supports ISO-8601 timestamps in GMT)
  • Fri Sep 1 00:35:55 EDT 2006, Paul Duncan <pabs@pablotron.org>
    • README: added Installation section (just covers rubygems at the moment, but I should have a note about the debian package, too)
    • rubilicious.rb: update version to 0.2.0
    • examples/add_link.rb: exit without proper cli args
    • examples/del_to_xbel.rb: use Rubilicious.to_xbel() instead of old Array#to_xbel
